item.description:
This is our annual gathering at Readercon for the dinner break.

I like to go to Sichuan Gourmet in Billerica, about six miles away. If you wish to meet us directly at the restaurant, the address is:

502 Boston Road

Directions from the Burlington Marriott:
From the parking lot, turn right onto Mall Road.
At the next light, turn left onto Cambridge Street, Route 3A.
Cambridge Street becomes Boston Road.
Sichuan Gourmet will be on your right, in the Convenient Plaza.
If you come to the rotary, you've gone too far.
item.how_to_find_us: We will gather in the lobby of the Marriott

group.name: The Boston Science Fiction & Fantasy Writers Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner at Readercon
